title: Currency Converter
description: Implement custom hooks, handle API requests, ensure components reusability, and create a currency conversion project.

title: Landing Page
description: Implement React routing using react-router-dom and create a simple portfolio application.This project introduces routing concepts in React.

title: ToDo List
description: Implement local storage for managing application data. Uses Context API with local storage to persist data and manage state.

title: Password generator
description: Implement useEffect, useCallback, useRef, and create a memoization project for a performance optimized password generator.
